title: Golden Champ Ashe Chroma and Ward
body:
I would like to ask that this is not purchasable unless you have the BASE skin

I was so happy at getting a 1350 RP skin as a reward for the Worlds quests, so I got it.

After I got it, I discovered that all i got out of it was a ****ing ward skin.

I would like my tokens back please, and a disclaimer put on it that you only recieve the skin if you've purchased the skin, instead of being lead to believe that you get the base skin with it. I'm not an ADC main, I don't know the Ashe skins. I was under the impression that that was giving you the championship ashe skin, the chroma and the ward.

Also, there was nothing I saw in the event that said you needed to have the base skin.

It can't be hard to put a notification up when you select it to forge that you must own the base skin to recieve the skin.

And please take this shitty ward back and give me my tokens back. Or gift anyone who's also fallen for this the base skin as well.

replies.body:
Hi Montiness,

You're not the only one that was confused by this. If you contact support they can reverse the transaction and remove the bundle contents from your account. Keep in mind though that this is the only time that you can get this chroma for Championship Ashe, it won't be coming back.
Just an additional note, you may have noticed in the store you cannot get a chroma unless you own the base skin, allowing you to get it implies that it gives you the base skin as well.
It's said even with regular chromas you need the base skin to use them

Thank you, I hadn't seen this earlier, and just bit the bullet and bought championship ashe.

It also seems that if you get the combo and then later buy the champ ashe skin, it DOES NOT give you the chroma then, either.

So I'll be adding that to the support ticket, thank you for the reply and the understanding.
